title: China Modern Lanzhou Escape with Yellow River Views
description: Overlooking the Yellow River, Crowne Plaza Lanzhou, an IHG Hotel, is a soaring gateway to this dynamic city. Sample delicacies such as Lanzhou beef noodles at local food stalls before returning for a soothing treatment at the hotel's onsite spa or a refreshing dip in the pool. As the sun sets, dine on traditional cuisine at China Town Restaurant, discover regional Halal dishes at the Persia Specialty Restaurant or savour a refined cocktail at the lobby lounge.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Lanzhou, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.1 Beibinhe Road East, Chengguan District, Lanzhou 730046, Mainland China
